name: Brain&
description:
Brain& is an intense puzzle game which takes the notorious BrainF*ck programming language to its limits.  Not only does the game take all the features of the original BrainF*ck, but it also expands upon it, implementing more possible commands and an entirely new way of execution.

Test your capabilities of minimalist programming in Brain&.  No knowledge of BrainF*ck required.

Song Used: 

Disco Metropolis by Vyra | https://soundcloud.com/vyramusic
